title: create_new_quiz
description: Test the API endpoint POST /quizzes to ensure that a teacher can successfully create a new quiz with valid title, description, school_id, teacher_id, class_id, is_published status, and duration_minutes.

title: add_questions_to_quiz
description: Test the API endpoint POST /quiz_questions to verify that multiple questions can be added to a quiz, including different question types such as multiple_choice and theory, with correct marks, options, and correct_answer fields.

title: get_quiz_details_by_id
description: Test the API endpoint GET /quizzes/{id} to ensure that a student can retrieve the details of a quiz by its unique ID, and the response contains all relevant quiz information.

title: fetch_questions_for_quiz
description: Test the API endpoint GET /quiz_questions with a quiz_id query parameter to verify that the questions for the specified quiz are correctly fetched and returned to the student.
